<title level="1" right="Trait">[Vampire](/Traits.aspx?ID=242)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

Undead creatures who thirst for blood, vampires are notoriously versatile and hard to destroy.
